name: Jiro Ono
bio: Jiro Ono is a Japanese chef who is known for her delicious and authentic Japanese cuisine. She has been cooking since a young age and has gained a loyal following for her recipes that are both traditional and innovative.

recipes.name: Sushi
recipes.making_details: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.Cut sushi-grade fish or other fillings into small pieces.Roll the rice and fillings in a sheet of nori, slice into pieces, and serve with wasabi and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Udon
recipes.making_details: Cook udon noodles according to package instructions and drain.Combine dashi stock, soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar in a pot and bring to a simmer. Add the cooked udon noodles to the pot and heat through before serving with toppings of your choice

recipes.name: Tofu
recipes.making_details: Coagulate soy milk by adding a coagulating agent such as nigari or gypsum. Pour the mixture into a mold and let it sit for 30-60 minutes to set. Remove the tofu from the mold, cut into desired shapes, and serve cold or hot as desired.
